author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CORE OF DANGEROUS HURRICANE BERYL EXPECTED TO IMPACT JAMAICA  MIDDAY BRINGING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE... ...EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY...
summary:
...CORE OF DANGEROUS HURRICANE BERYL EXPECTED TO IMPACT JAMAICA  MIDDAY BRINGING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE... ...EXPECTED TO APPROACH THE CAYMAN ISLANDS TONIGHT INTO THURSDAY...
 As of 5:00 AM EDT Wed Jul 3
 the center of Beryl was located near 16.6, -74.4
 with movement WNW at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 946 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 145 mph.
